channel.title: How can i make a certain npc id attack another certain npc id?
channel.description: well.. uhh... how do i do it? like i want it to make so it attacks a couple different npcs lets say i want to make it attack npc ids 73 and 74 how do i do this? were do i put it?

item.title: How can i make a certain npc id attack another certain npc id?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“watch n lern, post:10, topic:363529”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=459774.msg3364204#msg3364204 date=1286648949]

NPChandler.java

} else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == NPCID) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = ATTACKEMOTE;

just replace those and there you go…

huh? dude thats not what im talking about, this is different…
@usman,
its a 317
delta base (pkplanet)
[/quote]

my bad misread the question lol im not sure. ill look into it.[/quote]
ik what ur talking about, my last question, i got it to work, but anyways ok

Read full topic
